snippet: The Devils welcomed back right wing Ilya Kovalchuk, who played for St. Petersburg during the lockout and remained in Russia to play in the Kontinental Hockey League’s All-Star Game.
lead_paragraph: The Devils welcomed back right wing Ilya Kovalchuk, who played for St. Petersburg during the lockout and remained in Russia to play in the Kontinental Hockey League’s All-Star Game.

headline.seo: Back From Russia, Devils’ Kovalchuk Hits the Ground Skating
headline.main: Back From Russia, Devils’ Kovalchuk Hits the Ground Skating
headline.print_headline: Back From Russia, Devils’ Kovalchuk Hits the Ground Skating
